text: G. Udayagiri, or simply Udayagiri, is a town and a notified area committee in Kandhamal district in the state of Odisha, India. ==Geography== G. Udayagiri is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - G. Udayagiri It has an average elevation of . ==Demographics== India census, G. Udayagiri had a population of 10,206. Males constitute 49% of the population and females 51%. G. Udayagiri has an average literacy rate of 74%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 81%, and female literacy is 68%. In G. Udayagiri, 12% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Kandhamal district
title: G. Udayagiri
